coffeeTypes.name: espresso
coffeeTypes.description: also, known as a short black, it's a concentrated form of coffee, served in shots,

coffeeTypes.name: iced coffee
coffeeTypes.description: a coffee beverage served cold. It may be prepared either by brewing coffee normally and then serving it over ice or in cold milk or by brewing the coffee cold

coffeeTypes.name: latte
coffeeTypes.description: a milk coffee that is a made up of one or two shots of espresso, steamed milk and a final, thin layer of frothed milk on top

coffeeTypes.name: pour over
coffeeTypes.description: To make a pour-over coffee, the recommended ratio for coffee to water is 1:15, meaning for every 1 gram of coffee add 15 grams of water.

coffeeTypes.name: mocha
coffeeTypes.description: a caffeinated beverage that combines espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate, specifically hot chocolate

coffeeTypes.name: americano
coffeeTypes.description: Freshly pulled shots of espresso combined with hot water

coffeeTypes.name: cappuccino
coffeeTypes.description: an espresso-based coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with steamed milk foam
